quote: As a child, I heard many warnings from teachers about the perils of talking with strangers. Yet now, fairly late in my life, I can think of not many things better than to talk with strangers. The idea of being a stranger is also very appealing.

After being married, hearing 'You're hot!' from a total stranger means a hundred times more than hearing it from your husband.
